snippet: Under heavy pressure to excel, significant numbers of students are using cognitive enhancers to keep up with academic demands, recent studies show.
lead_paragraph: Under heavy pressure to excel, significant numbers of students are using cognitive enhancers to keep up with academic demands, recent studies show.

headline.main: European Students’ Use of ‘Smart Drugs’ Is Said to Rise
headline.print_headline: European Students' Use of 'Smart Drugs' Is Said to Rise
